alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 28 at 2:53AM MST until January 30 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. For eastern Box Elder County and the Cache Valley, wind chills between -10 to -20 are possible. For the Northern Wasatch Front, wind chills between 0 and -10 are possible. For the Great Salt Lake Desert, especially near the Idaho Border, wind chills between -10 to -25 are possible. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Unsheltered populations will be at high risk for hypothermia.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front
